channel.title: Sponge Bob Modifications
channel.description:
Here is a modification guide for the Fisher-Price SpongeBob used by Go Baby Go Central Ohio. This is an excellent car for small children and with its low platform you frequently do not even need a PVC frame, just a seatbelt. Also, this is an easy car to modify, so it is a good car for new builders to learn on or for a workshop. There are several ways to place the switches and all work pretty well.
![SpongeBob Instructions|509x500](upload://iJGPQzbefjeIuJkQ6fMbYGP2wQn.jpg)
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YrVoHMcCLhUX_FSFGRZV0Ufba6wJX2sB/view?usp=sharing
